sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>A flesh camouflage set is essentially a comprehensive disguise kit, allowing the user to temporarily but dramatically change his appearance and even foil bio-scanners, obscuring his genetic sequence or mimicking one from another person kind enough to "donate" a sample. The disguise is good enough that any checks made to ascertain the user's true identity have their difficulty set at Formidable (5 difficulty dice).  Restrictions: Many elements within the kit are perfectly legal on their own. but most planetary and Imperial authorities take a dim view of anyone actually carrying a set of items that allows the user to mask himself down to a genetic level.</description> <encumbrance>2</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Flesh Camoflage Set</name> <number>GEAR0001112</number> <price>2500</price> <range/> <rarity>7</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 22:37:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>52be00702fd4a450e0f497eef699b6a2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 22:37:04</sys_updated_on> <type>black_market_items</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
